## CLIConfigurationSpec.mode property

The default mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly mode?: Mode;
```

## Remarks

It can be changed at request level in the [hook](./kassette.configurationspec.hook.md) method through [mock.setMode](./kassette.imock.setmode.md)<!-- -->.
